text: "Hold Up" is a 2016 song by Beyoncé and is the third single from her sixth studio album Lemonade. It went to number 2 in Iceland, number 13 in the United States, number 11 in the United Kingdom, number 37 in Canada and Spain and number 52 in Ireland. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 2017. It went to the digital charts in New Zealand, Denmark, the Netherlands, Greece and Norway. ==References== Category:2016 songs Category:Beyoncé songs Category:Reggae songs
title: Hold Up (song)
